data.name: FindLeads
content: Bootstrapped a {{B2B prospecting platform}} tailored for boutique agencies, blending fresh data streams with opinionated workflows.
Crafted an event-sourced ingestion engine in {{Go}} with {{PostgreSQL}} search indexes, enabling sub-second filters across millions of leads.
Integrated billing and onboarding automations so new teams activate within minutes without manual intervention.

data.name: CloudPulse
content: Internal observability stack that unified {{metrics}}, {{logs}}, and {{traces}} for platform teams across microservices.
Streams telemetry through {{Kafka}} into {{ClickHouse}} with curated Grafana dashboards and SLO automation.
Reduced incident time-to-detect by 60% and empowered engineers with actionable runbooks fed by real-time signals.

data.name: InfraWeaver
content: A {{Terraform}} module library and scaffolding CLI that codifies best practices for AWS workloads across teams.
Encodes guardrails for {{networking}}, {{identity}}, and {{observability}} while staying composable for product squads.
Adopted by four teams to standardize infrastructure, trimming environment setup from weeks to days.

data.name: DeployMate
content: Opinionated deployment orchestrator that wraps {{GitHub Actions}} and {{ArgoCD}} with a friendly CLI and dashboards.
Supports preview environments, canary strategy, and automated incident rollback across Kubernetes clusters.
Adopted in production to handle 250+ deploys per week with full auditability and chat-ops integrations.

data.name: ShopiCSV
content: SaaS that synchronises {{Shopify}} catalogues with ERP exports by reconciling data from CSV, APIs, and webhooks.
Provides bulk transformations, validation rules, and live previews to keep merchandising and ops in sync.
Scaled to hundreds of stores with multi-tenant isolation, per-store throttling, and automated change alerts.

data.name: Nouvell
content: Serverless {{newsletter platform}} that turns product updates into personalised email journeys.
Runs on {{AWS Lambda}} with a {{GraphQL}} API, persistent queues, and per-subscriber analytics dashboards.
Used by early-stage founders to automate changelog updates and retain early adopters.

data.name: Polaris File Explorer
content: Front-end toolkit for managing {{Shopify Polaris}} file structures with diffing, previews, and collaborative cues.
Plugged into ShopiCSV and other storefront tools to visualise asset changes before release.
Improved merchant QA workflows by giving non-technical editors a safe review surface.

data.name: Plankton Synapse
content: Indie strategy game where players evolve modular neural networks to outsmart rival plankton colonies.
Handled {{game design}}, {{AI}}, UI, and tooling end-to-endâ€”from prototyping in C# to balancing gameplay in Unity.
Currently rewriting in {{Go}} with {{Raylib}} to explore deterministic replays and online multiplayer.
